content:
cfallin commented on Issue #2539:

Thanks, updated! As discussed just now, I'm happy to do some of the operand size-related refactors later, but I think it might be best to get this in sooner to avoid merge conflicts which seem to accumulate :-) Waiting for your final :+1: before merging though!

abrown commented on Issue #2539:

Consider this a :+1: from me. I think getting this type of thing in is better earlier than later, even without the refactoring opportunities we talked about.

cfallin commented on Issue #2539:

Opened #2586 to track the above refactors.
